promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute epic tortoise water-type pokemon wearing sapphire gemstones. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or tortoise. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sapphirashell, a a chibi cute epic tortoise water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: Swirling Waves. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "tortoise", "water" or "Sapphirashell". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, tortoise-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sapphire blue galaxy background
generatedDescription: This adorable lake dweller, Sapphirashell, uses its Swirling Waves ability to playfully surf and frolic. Glows blue when happy!
